enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of the element, making them suitable for setting up tests that involve class manipulation.
The toggleClass method also manipulates the class attribute, providing a complementary setup for testing class removal scenarios.
The hasClass method can be used to verify that a specific class has been removed from the element, providing a direct assertion for the removeClass method.
The classNames method can be used to inspect the current set of classes on the element, allowing for detailed assertions about the state of the class attribute after removal.
